work-item.field:
Refer to CSV-SOP-001 and CSV-SOP-004 as necessary to complete this test.  Ensure that all validation document types can be created, edited, and routed for approvals.  Consider the following actions as part of testing:
  • Editing content and work items.
  • Restructuring content.
  • Adding and removing approvers.
  • Commenting.
  • Other document management features as deemed necessary by tester.

• The tester executing this test must have the project_assignable role within the UAT project.
  • The tester executing this test must have sufficient knowledge as an end user of Polarion to complete this test.
  • The tester executing this test must have current training on CSV-SOP-001 and CSV-SOP-004.
